name: DRUVA [Multiple Critical Alerts]
description: Multiple critical severity Druva alerts were detected from the same source or for the same username within a short period of time. This could mean something has gone wrong and warrants attention.
query: class=druva eventtype=alert status=critical (has:username or has:source) NOT srcipv4:$exclusions.global.srcipv4

name: DRUVA [Access From Unauthorized Network]
description: This rule looks for a Druva admin audit trail log events in which a user made three successive attempts to access the inSync admin console from an unauthorized network.
query: class=druva eventtype=alert description:&[`unauthorized access`,`unauthorized network`] NOT srcipv4:$exclusions.global.srcipv4

name: DRUVA [Admin Unauthorized Access Attempt]
description: This rule looks for Druva admin audit trail log events in which a user was denied access to the inSync admin console from an unknown network.
query: class=druva eventtype=`admin audit trail` description:`unauthorized access` NOT srcipv4:$exclusions.global.srcipv4

name: DRUVA [Admin Restore Other People Files]
description: This rule looks for Druva admin audit trail log events in which an admin restores other users' files.
query: class=druva eventtype=`admin audit trail` description:&[`restore & share`,`downloaded`] NOT srcipv4:$exclusions.global.srcipv4

name: DRUVA [Admin Password Reset]
description: This rule looks for Druva admin audit trail log events in which an admin resets another admin's password.
query: class=druva eventtype=`admin audit trail` description:&[`administrators:`,`reset the password of an administrator`] NOT srcipv4:$exclusions.global.srcipv4
